hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio website. I am a passionate developer and designer.

about.title: About Me
about.introduction: I'm Juliana Amorim, a Full-Stack Web Developer and UX/UI Designer dedicated to crafting intuitive and impactful digital experiences.

factoria.title: Factor√≠a F5
factoria.description: An inclusive digital school in Spain, offering intensive, high-impact training in mobile and web development, aiming to provide access to high-demand employment opportunities.

tramontana.title: Instituto Tramontana
tramontana.description: A business school with a humanistic and multidisciplinary approach, focusing on elevating professionals who create products and services.

nuclio.title: Nuclio Digital School
nuclio.description: A leading digital training institution in Spain, offering Master's programs in areas like UX/UI Design and Full Stack Development, emphasizing practical, hands-on learning.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Crafting stunning and responsive websites that capture your brand's essence and engage your audience.

uiUxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiUxDesign.description: Enhancing UX with intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interface designs for both web and mobile applications.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Building robust, scalable, and high-performance websites using the latest technologies to ensure a seamless UX.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.introduction: Explore my portfolio showcasing a blend of modern web development, intuitive design, and technical expertise. Each project represents a unique challenge in creating seamless digital experiences that combine aesthetics with functionality.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.fullDescription: Crafting visually stunning and responsive websites that seamlessly adapt to any device. Each project showcases a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and user-centric design principles, featuring custom animations, thoughtful typography, and engaging visual hierarchies that bring brands to life in the digital space.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.fullDescription: Building sophisticated web applications with cutting-edge technologies. These projects demonstrate technical excellence through clean architecture, optimized performance, and seamless integration of complex features. From e-commerce platforms to custom CMS solutions, each application is built with scalability and maintainability in mind.

uiUxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiUxDesign.fullDescription: Creating intuitive and delightful user experiences through meticulous research and design thinking. These projects showcase comprehensive user journey mapping, interactive prototypes, and pixel-perfect UI designs. Each solution is crafted to solve real user problems while maintaining visual consistency and accessibility standards.

cta.title: Let's work together
cta.description: Get in touch and let's bring your ideas to life
